Package players

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.Player
      • players.AI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerPlay, Effect

    public class AI
extends Player
    Defines other players as AI, how they play and the strategy they use Also defines the effect of changing color during the game. Inherits from the class Player.
    Author:
    Benjamin Héroult
    See Also:
    Player

        public AI​(java.lang.String name,

        Parameters:

        strategy - strategy chosen by the player (by choosing the difficulty level)

    • Method Detail

      • playCard

        public boolean playCard​(Card card_to_play,
                        Game game)
        Makes the AI play a card, and calls the method executeEffect to execute the effect possibly associated.
        Parameters:
        card_to_play - the card to play
        game - used to execute the effects
        Returns:
        true if the player played successfully the card, false if and error occurred or if the player has to replay

      • play

        public void play​(Game game)
        Makes the AI pick cards as penalty if necessary, makes it choose witch card to play and if it wants to say card.
        Overrides:
        play in class Player
        Parameters:
        game - used to call the method playCard
